What is 'Readers From RSS 2 BLOG'?

'Readers From RSS 2 BLOG' is a innovative WordPress plug-in for your RSS FEEDS. What's amazing is that it increases your SALES AND BLOG audiences by converting your Blog RSS FEED into DEADLY marketing weapon offering you greater control and flexibility.
